definition: local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc

sentences.english: Peking Opera in China has a history of approximately 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 京劇在中國約有200年曆史，它是北京的地方戲。

sentences.english: Although only a local drama, Huangmei Opera is popular with many people.
sentences.chinese: 地方戲應該受到保護，它是民間文化重要的一部分。

sentences.english: The main achievement of the local drama in the Qing Dynasty reflected on the art of the performance.
sentences.chinese: 清代地方戲的主要成就體現在表演藝術上。

sentences.english: Sichuan Opera is a typical local opera in Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 川劇是比較有代表性的四川地方戲。

sentences.english: Night fell. From the loud speakers came local opera tunes.
sentences.chinese: 夜色降臨，喇叭裏傳來地方戲的曲調。

sentences.english: In this article, the local opera of Shandong is analyzed briefly from the angle of historical geography.
sentences.chinese: 本文從歷史地理的角度對山東地方戲進行了簡單分析。
